author: Nick Nairn
method: Place all the ingredients, except the mint into a large bowl and whisk until the mixture forms soft peaks, when the whisk is removed. To serve, place in a glass bowl and garnish with a sprig of fresh mint.
ingredients: 100ml/3½fl oz double cream, lightly whipped,  ½ lemon, zest only,  1 tbsp white wine,  2 tbsp icing sugar,  squeeze fresh lemon,  1 sprig fresh mint, to garnish
